sentences.en: He stepped a minuet gravely and gracefully.
sentences.cn: 他的小步舞跳得庄重而优美.

sentences.en: The pupils laughed at the sight of their teacher dancing a minuet in the yard.
sentences.cn: 小学生们一看到他们的老师在院子里跳小舞步都笑起来了.

trans.tran_cn: 米奴哀舞，小步舞，米奴哀舞曲，小步舞曲
trans.tran_en: a slow dance of the 17th and 18th centuries, or a piece of music for this dance
